user_input: Please edit to summarize slide number 1.

tasks.target: All content elements on slide 1 (text, images, charts, etc.)
tasks.action: Identify key points and main ideas.
tasks.contents: COM error: (-2147221008, 'CoInitialize가 호출되지 않았습니다.', None, None)
edit target content: COM error: (-2147221008, 'CoInitialize가 호출되지 않았습니다.', None, None)
content after edit: COM error: (-2147221008) - 'CoInitialize has not been called.' This error indicates that the COM library was not initialized properly before use. To fix this issue, ensure that CoInitialize (or CoInitializeEx) is called successfully at the start of the application or before any COM components are accessed.

tasks.action: Write a brief summary encompassing the key points identified in the previous step.  Consider reducing the number of bullet points or sentences.

content after edit: Error: COM initialization failed because CoInitialize was not called.
